Bridgewater Associates | Westport, CT | Onsite | Full Time| Visa and Relocation assistance

We are currently hiring technologists across the company to help on a variety of initiatives. We are developing an infrastructure for the future, which will be a cloud-based, secure, and highly available platform, using technologies like AWS, Ansible, and Chef. We are also building an IDE for investment logic which allows our researchers to express their ideas and test them in a variety of economic conditions, using Scala, Cassandra, grid computing, and other technologies. We have dozens of other projects and are hiring for many roles - just apply if you want to learn more.
